title: Tidying Up
entries: No more awkward backup warnings when you haven't even started counting
Images now gracefully retry through a backup route if your browser is feeling overprotective

title: Rebrickable BFFs
entries: Export your counted parts as a Rebrickable-compatible CSV — finally, your hard work travels!

title: Squeeze Play
entries: Your progress is now compressed before saving — big sets like the Millennium Falcon use way less storage

title: Safe & Sound
entries: Backup & restore your sets as .bricktally files — never lose your counting progress again
Smart delete dialog warns you about unsaved work before nuking a set
Hide-complete toggle now lives in the section headers where it belongs

title: Polish & Shine
entries: Compact desktop header puts the set image and info side by side
No more layout jiggle when the decrement button appears
Parts only show complete for their own count — spare parts don't steal the checkmark
Increment button shows a checkmark when you're one piece away from done

title: Badge of Honor
entries: Generate a shareable PNG badge showing your set completion — perfect for eBay listings!
Search bar simplified — just type and go, no extra button needed

title: Spare Parts Party
entries: Spare parts now get their own section — count them separately from the main build
Minifigure support landed — track your little people too

title: Zoom Zoom
entries: Click any part image to zoom in with a slick lightbox view
Parts break out of the table when zoomed — very dramatic

title: Going Offline
entries: BrickTally is now a full PWA — install it and count bricks even without internet
Your set history shows right on the main page

title: The Beginning
entries: Tap quantities to instantly fill your count — no more mashing +
Checkmarks for single-quantity items instead of a lonely increment button
Color filters to focus on one color at a time
